languages.text: {n}Одним плавным движением друкари обнажает оружие.{/n} "Прежде, чем твоя душа сгинет в пасти Той, Что Жаждет, я научу ее боли — такой, которой ты не знала за всю свою жизнь, сестра".

traits.locale_text: {n}Одним плавным движением друкари обнажает оружие.{/n} "Прежде, чем твоя душа сгинет в пасти Той, Что Жаждет, я научу ее боли — такой, которой ты не знала за всю свою жизнь, сестра".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai draws his weapon in a single fluid motion.{/n} "Before your soul perishes in the maw of She Who Thirsts, I will teach it pain — the kind of pain you have never known in the whole of your existence, sister."
languages.original_text: {n}Одним плавным движением друкари обнажает оружие.{/n} "Прежде, чем твоя душа сгинет в пасти Той, Что Жаждет, я научу ее боли — такой, которой ты не знала за всю свою жизнь, сестра".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai draws his weapon in a single fluid motion.{/n} "Before your soul perishes in the maw of She Who Thirsts, I will teach it pain — the kind of pain you have never known in your entire life, sister."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai draws his weapon in a single fluid motion.{/n} "Before your soul perishes in the maw of She Who Thirsts, I will teach it pain — the kind of pain you have never known in your entire life, sister."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai draws his weapon in a single fluid motion.{/n} "Before your soul perishes in the maw of She Who Thirsts, I will teach it pain — the kind of pain you have never known in the whole of your existence, sister."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai draws his weapon in a single fluid motion.{/n} "Before your soul perishes in the maw of She Who Thirsts, I will teach it pain — the kind of pain you have never known in the whole of your existence, sister."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}D'un geste fluide, Marazhai dégaine son arme.{/n} « Avant que l'Assoiffée ne se repaisse de votre âme, je vais m'assurer de vous faire découvrir la véritable douleur, une souffrance que vous n'avez encore jamais connue, ma sœur. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai draws his weapon in a single fluid motion.{/n} "Before your soul perishes in the maw of She Who Thirsts, I will teach it pain — the kind of pain you have never known in the whole of your existence, sister."

traits.locale_text: {n}D'un geste fluide, Marazhai dégaine son arme.{/n} « Avant que l'Assoiffée ne se repaisse de votre âme, je vais m'assurer de vous faire découvrir la véritable douleur, une souffrance que vous n'avez encore jamais connue, ma sœur. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋以无比流畅的动作拔出武器。{/n}“在你的灵魂葬身于饥渴女士的巨口之前，我会让它品尝到痛苦的滋味。那会是你此生中从未体验过的痛苦，姐姐。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai draws his weapon in a single fluid motion.{/n} "Before your soul perishes in the maw of She Who Thirsts, I will teach it pain — the kind of pain you have never known in the whole of your existence, sister."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋以无比流畅的动作拔出武器。{/n}“在你的灵魂葬身于饥渴女士的巨口之前，我会让它品尝到痛苦的滋味。那会是你此生中从未体验过的痛苦，妹妹。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai zieht mit einer einzigen flüssigen Bewegung seine Waffe.{/n} "Bevor Eure Seele im Schlund von Ihr, die dürstet, verendet, lehre ich sie Schmerz. Schmerz, wie Ihr ihn in Eurem ganzen Leben noch nie erlebt habt, Schwester."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai draws his weapon in a single fluid motion.{/n} "Before your soul perishes in the maw of She Who Thirsts, I will teach it pain — the kind of pain you have never known in the whole of your existence, sister."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai zieht mit einer einzigen flüssigen Bewegung seine Waffe.{/n} "Bevor Eure Seele im Schlund von Ihr, die dürstet, verendet, lehre ich sie Schmerz. Schmerz, wie Ihr ihn in Eurem ganzen Leben noch nie erlebt habt, Schwester."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai saca su arma con un solo movimiento fluido.{/n} «Antes de que la Sedienta se lleve tu alma, le causaré dolor... un dolor que nunca has experimentado en toda tu vida, hermana».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai draws his weapon in a single fluid motion.{/n} "Before your soul perishes in the maw of She Who Thirsts, I will teach it pain — the kind of pain you have never known in the whole of your existence, sister."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai saca su arma con un solo movimiento fluido.{/n} «Antes de que la Sedienta se lleve tu alma, le causaré dolor... un dolor que nunca has experimentado en toda tu vida, hermana».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、流れるような動きで武器を抜く。{/n}「お前の魂がかの渇きたる女の胃袋で滅びる前に、俺が痛みを教えてやろう…これまで生きてきて一度も経験したことのない痛みだぜ、姉さん」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai draws his weapon in a single fluid motion.{/n} "Before your soul perishes in the maw of She Who Thirsts, I will teach it pain — the kind of pain you have never known in the whole of your existence, sister."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは、流れるような動きで武器を抜く。{/n}「お前の魂がかの渇きたる女の胃袋で滅びる前に、俺が痛みを教えてやろう…これまで生きてきて一度も経験したことのない痛みだぜ、姉さん」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, akıcı bir hareketle silahını çekiyor.{/n} "Ruhun, Susayan'ın ağzında yok olmadan önce ona acıyı, varoluşun boyunca asla öğrenmediğin o acının ne olduğunu öğreteceğim ablacığım."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai draws his weapon in a single fluid motion.{/n} "Before your soul perishes in the maw of She Who Thirsts, I will teach it pain — the kind of pain you have never known in the whole of your existence, sister."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai akıcı bir hareketle silahını çekiyor.{/n} "Ruhun Susayan'ın ağzında yok olmadan önce ona acının ne olduğunu öğreteceğim. Varoluşun boyunca asla öğrenmediğin o acıyı ablacığım."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
